hanzi-su-wiki:
李

Значения

Слива

Мнемоника

Слива, дерево 木 для детей 子. Плоды — слабительное, сок незрелых плодов — сильное жаропонижающее.

lǐ
surname Li; plum
фамилия Ли; слива
rtega_mnemonic:
李李RSplum, judge
  • RS. a kind of tree 木 that children 子 like
  • child 子 of the tree 木
  • judge speaks like to an audience of children 子 under the tree 木
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 子 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
张冠李戴 [ zhāng guān lǐ dài ]: lit. to put Zhang's hat on Li's head; to attribute sth to the wrong person (idiom); to confuse one thing with another
张三李四 [ zhāng sān lǐ sì ]: Zhang the Third and Li the Fourth (idiom); Tom, Dick and Harry
投桃报李 [ tóu táo bào lǐ ]: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor; to exchange gifts; Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
瓜田李下 [ guā tián lǐ xià ]: abbr. for 瓜田不納履 ，瓜田不纳履 ，李下不整冠
李代桃僵 [ lǐ dài táo jiāng ]: lit. the plum tree withers in place of the peach tree; to substitute one thing for another; to carry the can for sb
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 子 [ zi ] son, child; seed, egg; fruit; small thing
heisig_chinese_memo: A kid falls out a tree and the father exclaims, "Damn, son! Watch where you're going when you go plum-pickin'!".
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 季 (キ время года, сезон).

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A kid falls out a tree and the father exclaims, "Damn, son! Watch where you're going when you go plum-pickin'!".
humanum_full_description_en:
The word " Li " in the oracle bone inscriptions from "来" from " Zi " (Ji Xusheng), see "Collection" 19564. It may be interpreted separately as the word "laizi", which cannot be studied due to incomplete inscriptions. In addition, "Collection" 41605 has the character " Li " from " Mu " and " Zi ", which is pseudo-engraved.

" Li " uses " Zi " and " Lai " as sound symbols, and the ancient sounds of the three characters are similar. Because " Li " is used as the fruit name, the sound symbol " Lai " is changed to " Wood ". Bronze inscriptions have " Li " from " Wood " from " Zi ", which is used as the name of a person, see Sanshi Disk. Warring States pottery inscriptions and seals have been further classified into " wood ".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period inherited the oracle bone inscriptions from " lai " from " zi ", pronounced " li ", referring to the judge. Such as "Shangbo Bamboo Book One. "Rong Chengshi" Jian 29: "Nai Li Jiao (皋) Tao Wei (Yi) Li", the whole sentence means that Gao Tao was ordered to be a judge. Another example is "Shangbo Bamboo Book Eight. "Li Song" Jane 2: "The clan (is) the ancient (the old) saints, and Wu (things) based on Li (li) favors." " Li " is also known as " li ", which means conditioning. The whole sentence means that the sage possesses these virtues and harmonizes affairs to regulate the human relationship.

"Shuowen": "Li, Guoye. From wood, Zisheng. 杍, ancient Chinese." Press the word "杍" from " wood " and " zi " sound, not " Li " ancient Chinese. Wang Yun's "Shu Wenju Reading": "Those who don't speak ancient literary Li, cover the ancient Wen Zi. The Zi character is rotten, and the school is attached to it with a similar shape. "Book of Zhou": "Zicai", Ma Rong said: "Ancient Make a character.""
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " zi " to " come ", " Li " is a pair of tonal characters. Because it was used as the fruit of the plum tree, " lai " was gradually transformed into " wood " (Zheng Gang, Ji Xusheng). The original meaning of doubt is fruit name (Xu Shen). It is now mostly used as a surname.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文「李」字從「來」從「子」(季旭昇)，見《合集》19564。或有分開釋為「來子」二字，由於卜辭辭殘，無法考訂。另《合集》41605有從「木」從「子」的「李」字，字屬偽刻。

　　「李」以「子」、「來」為聲符，三字古音相近。因「李」用作果名，所以改聲符「來」為「木」。金文有從「木」從「子」的「李」，用作人名，見散氏盤。戰國陶文與璽印已進一步類化成「木」。

　　戰國竹簡繼承甲骨文從「來」從「子」的寫法，讀為「理」，指法官。如《上博竹書一．容成氏》簡29：「乃立咎(皐)陶㠯(以)為李」，全句指於是命令皐陶作法官。另如《上博竹書八．李頌》簡2：「氏(是)古(故)聖人兼此，和勿(物)以李(理)人情。」「李」亦通假為「理」，指調理。全句指因此聖人兼有這些美德，協和事務以調理人情。

　　《說文》：「李，果也。从木，子聲。杍，古文。」按「杍」字從「木」，「子」聲，並非「李」字古文。王筠《說文句讀》：「不言古文李者，蓋本云古文梓。梓字爛脫，校者以形似而附此也。〈周書〉：『梓材』，馬融曰：『古作杍字。』」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「子」從「來」，「李」是一雙聲符字。因用為李樹的果實，「來」逐漸類化作「木」(鄭剛、季旭昇)。本義疑為果名(許慎)。現多用作姓氏。

甲骨文「 李 」字從「 來 」從「 子 」(季旭昇)，見《合集》19564。或有分開釋為「來子」二字，由於卜辭辭殘，無法考訂。另《合集》41605有從「 木 」從「 子 」的「 李 」字，字屬偽刻。 「 李 」以「 子 」、「 來 」為聲符，三字古音相近。因「 李 」用作果名，所以改聲符「 來 」為「 木 」。金文有從「 木 」從「 子 」的「 李 」，用作人名，見散氏盤。戰國陶文與璽印已進一步類化成「 木 」。 戰國竹簡繼承甲骨文從「 來 」從「 子 」的寫法，讀為「 理 」，指法官。如《上博竹書一．容成氏》簡29：「乃立咎(皐)陶㠯(以)為李」，全句指於是命令皐陶作法官。另如《上博竹書八．李頌》簡2：「氏(是)古(故)聖人兼此，和勿(物)以李(理)人情。」「 李 」亦通假為「 理 」，指調理。全句指因此聖人兼有這些美德，協和事務以調理人情。 《說文》：「李，果也。从木，子聲。杍，古文。」按「 杍 」字從「 木 」，「 子 」聲，並非「 李 」字古文。王筠《說文句讀》：「不言古文李者，蓋本云古文梓。梓字爛脫，校者以形似而附此也。〈周書〉：『梓材』，馬融曰：『古作杍字。』」

In addition, "Collection" 41605 has the character " Li" from " Mu" and " Zi", which is pseudo-engraved. " Li" uses " Zi" and " Lai" as sound symbols, and the ancient sounds of the three characters are similar. Because " Li" is used as the fruit name, the sound symbol " Lai" is changed to " Wood". Bronze inscriptions have " Li" from " Wood" from " Zi", which is used as the name of a person, see Sanshi Disk. Warring States pottery inscriptions and seals have been further classified into " wood". The bamboo slips of the Warring States period inherited the oracle bone inscriptions from " lai" from " zi", pronounced " li", referring to the judge. Such as "Shangbo Bamboo Book One. "Rong Chengshi" Jian 29: "Nai Li Jiao (皋) Tao Wei (Yi) Li", the whole sentence means that Gao Tao was ordered to be a judge. Another example is "Shangbo Bamboo Book Eight. "Li Song" Jane 2: "The clan (is) the ancient (the old) saints, and Wu (things) based on Li (li) favors." " Li" is also known as " li", which means conditioning. 李字的基本解释

李
lǐ
落叶小乔木，果实称“李子”，熟时呈黄色或紫红色，可食：李代桃僵（原用“桃”“李”共患难来喻兄弟相爱相助，后喻互相顶替或代他人受过）。投桃报李。李下不正冠（喻要避免不必要的嫌疑）。桃李不言，下自成蹊（喻为人只要忠诚、正直一定会感动别人）。
姓。
古同“理”，古代法官的代称。

李字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐ］
［《廣韻》良士切，上止，來。］
(1)果木名。蔷薇科，落叶小乔木。叶长椭圆形至椭圆倒卵形，花白色，果实圆形，果皮紫红、青绿或黄绿。果味甜，可生食及制蜜饯。果仁、根皮供药用。
(2)指李树的果实。
(3)通“理”。古代狱官，法官。
(4)通“理”。道理，规律。
(5)通“理”。惩治。
(6)通“理”。见“行李”。
(7)姓。

李字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　李； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页511第11
〔古文〕杍【唐韻】【正韻】良以切【集韻】兩耳切【韻會】良士切，?音里。【說文】果名。【素問】東方木也。【爾雅翼】李，木之多子者。【埤雅】李性難老，雖枝枯，子亦不細，其品處桃上。【詩·小雅】投我以桃，報之以李。　又【韻會】世薦士謂之桃李。【劉向·說苑】樹桃李者，夏得休息，秋得其實焉。樹蒺藜者，夏不得休息，秋得其莿焉。世謂狄仁傑，桃李皆在公門，正用此事。　又【博雅】行李，關驛也。　又與理通。【左傳·僖十三年】行李之往來。【周語】行李以節逆之。【泊宅編】李理義通，人將有行，必先治?，如孟子之言治任。理亦治也。　又星名。【史記·天官書】熒惑爲李。【徐廣註】內則理兵，外則理政。　又司理，?官，亦稱司李。【前漢·胡建傳】黃帝李法。【管子·法法篇】臯陶爲李。又檇李，春秋吳地。　又姓。【風俗通】伯陽之後。

考證：〔【前漢·胡建傳】黃帝李治。〕　謹照原文治改法。
李字的源字形

李字的起名意思

：落叶小乔木，果实称“李子”，熟时呈黄色或紫红色，可食；姓。

Lee
Basic explanation of words
Lee
lǐ
Small deciduous tree, the fruit is called "plum". It is yellow or purple when ripe. It is edible: Li generation peach stiff (the original use of "peach" and "plum" to refer to brothers' love and help each other, and later it is used to substitute for each other or to bear on behalf of others). Give it back. Li Xia is not crowned (Yu wants to avoid unnecessary suspicion). Peach and plum do not say anything, but they are all self-contained (for example, as long as people are loyal and upright, they will definitely move others).
name.
The ancients are the same as "li", a proxy for ancient judges.
Lee
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐ］
["Guangyun" Liangshi cut, top stop, come. ]
(1) The name of the fruit tree. Rosaceae, small deciduous tree. The leaves are oblong to elliptic obovate, the flowers are white, the fruit is round, and the skin is purple, green or yellow-green. Fruity and sweet, it can be eaten raw and candied. The nuts and root bark are used for medicinal purposes.
(2) Refers to the fruit of the plum tree.
(3) Through "reason". Ancient prison officer, judge.
(4) Through "reason". Reason, law.
(5) Through "reason". punish.
(6) Through "reason". See "baggage".
(7) Last name.
Lee
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Li; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 511 No. 11
〔古文〕杍【Tang Yun】【Zheng Yun】Liang Yiqie 【Ji Yun】Two ears cut 【Rhyme will】Good man cut,? Yinli. 【Said the text】The name of the fruit. [Su Wen] Dongfang Muye. 【Erya Yi】Li, the tree of many children. [Piya] Li is difficult to grow old, although the branches are withered, the seeds are not thin, and its taste is on peaches. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Vote me as a peach, and repay me with a plum.　[Rhyme Club] Shijia Shi called the peach and plum. [Liu Xiang·Said Garden] For those who grow peaches and plums, summer has to rest, but autumn is actually ridiculous. Those who tree thistles can't rest in summer, but get it in autumn. The world said that Di Renjie, peaches and plums are at the public door, and are using this matter.　[Bo Ya] Luggage, Guan Yi also.　And Litong again. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Thirteen Years] The exchange of luggage. [Zhou Yu] Luggage keeps in good order. [Bo Zhai] Li Liyitong, people will have deeds, must first govern? Just like Mencius's words governing responsibility. Reason is also governed.　Also star name. [Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials] Yinghuo is Li. [Xu Guang's Note] Internal control of soldiers, external control of politics.　Second Li, Guan, also known as Si Li. [Previous Han·Hu Jian Chuan] Huang Di Li Fa. [Guanzi·Fafa Chapter] Gao Tao is Li. Li again, Wudi in Spring and Autumn.　Another last name. [Customs] After Boyang. Textual research: [[Previous Han·Hu Jianzhuan] Huangdi Li Zhi. 〕 　 I would like to reform the law according to the original text.

Первоначальное значение - название плодового дерева.
